summary.span: 指定 中屬性的條件約束 (Constraint)。

span.span: Specifies the constraints of a property in a .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 類別繼承自類別，並產生， ， ，和用來定義屬性的值。The class inherits from the class and generates the , , , and values used to define the properties of a . 每個屬性值的有效性潀糔蠮和手寫筆的製造商而異。The validity of each property value varies depending on the manufacture of the digitizer and stylus. ## Examples 下列範例會建立物件從並取得每個資訊中。The following example creates an object from a and gets the information for each in the . summary.span: 取得將 屬性值轉換為單位的縮放。

span.span: Gets the scale that converts a property value into units.

value.span: 將 屬性值轉換為單位的縮放。

span.span: The scale that converts a property value into units.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 值，乘以解析度屬性來取得其單位為基礎的值。Multiply the resolution by the value of a property to get its unit-based value. 例如，如果屬性的值為 100，單位為英吋，而且解析度為.01，然後乘以 100.01 會顯示該屬性的值為 1 英吋。For example, if a property's value is 100, the unit is inches, and the resolution is .01, then multiplying 100 by .01 reveals that the value of that property is 1 inch. ## Examples 下列範例會建立物件從並取得每個資訊中。The following example creates a object from a and gets the information for each in the . [!code-csharp[PacketSpy#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PacketSpy/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#2)] [!code-vb[PacketSpy#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PacketSpy/VisualBasic/Window1.xaml.vb#2)] [!code-csharp[PacketSpy#4](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PacketSpy/CSharp/Window1.xaml.cs#4)] [!code-vb[PacketSpy#4](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Wpf/PacketSpy/VisualBasic/Window1.xaml.vb#4)]
